channel.title: Tyden 562/668 Development Team (RECRUITING)
channel.description:
[center]__________________________________________________________________________ [img]http://i2.lulzimg.com/8b71ece8e3.png[/img] [b]Update progress:[/b] A lot more have been completed before April 4th. I forgot most of them though.
[COLOR=lime]May 16, 2012[/COLOR] Added ice prison attack for nex, finishing castlewars still.
[COLOR=lime]May 12, 2012[/COLOR] Started a castlewars base.
[COLOR=lime]May 11, 2012[/COLOR] 100% working music!!!! Nearly all regions works :D Fixed multi combat zones for players.
[COLOR=lime]May 9, 2012[/COLOR] 100% music unlocking system! Music by region is only 20% done. I need to get region ids.
[COLOR=lime]May 6, 2012[/COLOR] GrandExchange now 90% works. Just need to fix prices.
[COLOR=lime]May 2, 2012[/COLOR] Npc vs npc system done. All bugs fixed. Added Ice prison for nex.
[COLOR=Lime]May 1, 2012[/COLOR] NVN system has been improved A LOT! 85% complete. Npc walking bug is being fixed.
[COLOR=lime]April 29, 2012[/COLOR] Adding NPC VS NPC system about 30% done. Still lots of bugs.
[COLOR=lime]April 15, 2012[/COLOR] Finished working on 75% Nex with working phases and attacks Using 668 now.
[COLOR=Lime]April 4, 2012[/COLOR] Rewrote magic, its now much more customisable with correct proj __________________________________________________________________________
[u][b]Introduction[/b][/u] Hello everyone! I have been working on Tyden 562/668 for a while now and I have been slowly losing interest in coding it because honestly, It sucks coding in a solo team. So now, I'm currently recruiting 2-4 developers that could help me develop Tyden with me. __________________________________________________________________________ [u][b]Info[/b][/u] For more information, please visit the project thread here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html[/url] __________________________________________________________________________ [u][b]Layout [/b][/u]
Here is the layout:
[code]Contact Information(MSN/Skype): Knowledge in coding 562RS2HD(rate between 1-5): Your projects/work: Do you know more then just spawning npcs, adding shops etc? Age: Why do you want to become apart of my development team? Do you know how to use eclipse or any other IDE? Any extra information?
[/code]
[u]Current Coders[/u] Me
[u]More info[/u] Hopefully I will get some decent developers :P I don't think many people are coding 562s any more. It's mostly 667/*** but hopefully I will get some developers :D Don't forget to visit the project thread!
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html[/url]
__________________________________________________________________________ ---[/center]

item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

[center]__________________________________________________________________________

Update progress:
A lot more have been completed before April 4th. I forgot most of them though.

[COLOR=lime]May 16, 2012[/COLOR]
Added ice prison attack for nex, finishing castlewars still.

[COLOR=lime]May 12, 2012[/COLOR]
Started a castlewars base.

[COLOR=lime]May 11, 2012[/COLOR]
100% working music!!! Nearly all regions works Fixed multi combat zones for players.

100% music unlocking system! Music by region is only 20% done. I need to get region ids.

[COLOR=lime]May 6, 2012[/COLOR]
GrandExchange now 90% works. Just need to fix prices.

[COLOR=lime]May 2, 2012[/COLOR]
Npc vs npc system done. All bugs fixed. Added Ice prison for nex.

NVN system has been improved A LOT! 85% complete. Npc walking bug is being fixed.

Adding NPC VS NPC system about 30% done. Still lots of bugs.

Finished working on 75% Nex with working phases and attacks
Using 668 now.

[COLOR=Lime]April 4, 2012[/COLOR]
Rewrote magic, its now much more customisable with correct proj

Introduction
Hello everyone! I have been working on Tyden 562/668 for a while now and I have been slowly losing interest in coding it because honestly, It sucks coding in a solo team. So now, I’m currently recruiting 2-4 developers that could help me develop Tyden with me.

Info
For more information, please visit the project thread here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html

Layout

Here is the layout:

[code]Contact Information(MSN/Skype):
Knowledge in coding 562RS2HD(rate between 1-5):
Your projects/work:
Do you know more then just spawning npcs, adding shops etc?
Age:
Why do you want to become apart of my development team?
Do you know how to use eclipse or any other IDE?
Any extra information?

[/code]

Current Coders
Me

More info
Hopefully I will get some decent developers I don’t think many people are coding
562s any more. It’s mostly 667/*** but hopefully I will get some developers
Don’t forget to visit the project thread!

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543838.0.html

—[/center]

Read full topic
